trans-unit.source: Represents a state in a <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta uno stato in un <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] The StateActivity represents a State in a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]StateActivity rappresenta uno stato in un <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity>.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateMachineWorkflowActivity>

trans-unit.source: State activities could contain one or more <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>, or StateActivity classes, one <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> class, and one <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateFinalizationActivity> class.
trans-unit.target: Le attività state può contenere uno o più <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>, o classi StateActivity, una <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity>classe e una <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateFinalizationActivity>classe.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateFinalizationActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>

trans-unit.source: SetState activities are used inside an <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventHandlersActivity> and <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> to move the state of the workflow.
trans-unit.target: Attività SetState sono utilizzate all'interno di un <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventHandlersActivity>e <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity>per spostare lo stato del flusso di lavoro.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventHandlersActivity>

trans-unit.source: When a StateActivity is executing, the only events that can be received are the events that can be handled by the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> activities in the StateActivity and also the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> activities attached to the enclosing StateActivity activities and the root <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>.
trans-unit.target: Quando è in esecuzione un StateActivity, gli unici eventi che possono essere ricevuti sono gli eventi che possono essere gestiti dalle <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>attività StateActivity e anche le <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>attività collegate al contenitore attività StateActivity e radice <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>

trans-unit.source: When the StateActivity starts running, the StateActivity will check to see whether a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> activity is present or not.
trans-unit.target: Quando viene avviata il StateActivity esecuzione, StateActivity controllerà per vedere se un <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity>sia presente un'attività.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity>

trans-unit.source: The StateActivity can have zero or one <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> activity.
trans-unit.target: StateActivity può contenere zero o un <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity>attività.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity>

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> activity is present the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> will be executed.
trans-unit.target: Se un <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity>sia presente un'attività di <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity>verrà eseguito.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity>

trans-unit.source: As soon as the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity> activity finishes, the StateActivity blocks events so that the StateActivity only receives events that can be handled by its <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> activities.
trans-unit.target: Non appena il <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity>al completamento dell'attività, gli eventi di blocchi StateActivity in modo che StateActivity riceve solo gli eventi che possono essere gestiti dalle relative <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>attività.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.StateInitializationActivity>

trans-unit.source: The StateActivity is a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>, meaning the StateActivity activity can contain other activities.
trans-unit.target: StateActivity è un <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>, vale a dire l'attività StateActivity può contenere altre attività.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref> class using the name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"> </xref> classe utilizzando il nome dell'attività.

trans-unit.source: The user-defined name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: Il nome dell'attività definita dall'utente.

trans-unit.source: Cancels the execution of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Annulla l'esecuzione del <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The execution context for the activity.
trans-unit.target: Il contesto di esecuzione per l'attività.

trans-unit.source: The current status of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> in the running workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Lo stato corrente di <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> nell'istanza del flusso di lavoro in esecuzione.

trans-unit.source: Executes the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Esegue il <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The execution context for the activity.
trans-unit.target: Il contesto di esecuzione per l'attività.

trans-unit.source: The current status of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> in the running workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: Lo stato corrente di <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> nell'istanza del flusso di lavoro in esecuzione.

trans-unit.source: Gets the executing instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> that corresponds to the specified child activity name.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'istanza di esecuzione di <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref> che corrisponde al nome dell'attività figlio specificato.

trans-unit.source: The child activity.
trans-unit.target: L'attività figlio.

trans-unit.source: The dynamic child activities.
trans-unit.target: Le attività figlio dinamiche.

trans-unit.source: The executable activities do not contain the childActivityName.
trans-unit.target: Le attività eseguibili non contengono il childActivityName .

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref> using the service provider.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza il <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"> </xref> utilizzando il provider del servizio.

trans-unit.source: The service provider from which to obtain services.
trans-unit.target: Il provider di servizi da cui ottenere i servizi.

trans-unit.source: Determines if the activity being added is an <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity"></xref> and if so, verifies whether the newly added event driven needs to be subscribed.
trans-unit.target: Determina se l'attività da aggiungere è un <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity"> </xref> e in tal caso, verifica se la nuova aggiunta basata sugli eventi deve essere sottoscritta.

trans-unit.source: This is method is called whenever a user adds a child to a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity> through workflow changes.
trans-unit.target: Si tratta di metodo viene chiamato ogni volta che un utente aggiunge un elemento figlio di un <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>attraverso WorkflowChanges.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>

trans-unit.source: Note that this method is defined in CompositeActivity and overridden by the StateActivity, where it checks whether the activity being added is an <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity> and if so, verifies if the newly added event driven needs to be subscribed.
trans-unit.target: Si noti che questo metodo è definito in CompositeActivity e sottoposto a override da StateActivity, in cui viene verificato se l'attività da aggiungere è un <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>e in tal caso, verifica se la nuova aggiunta basata sugli eventi deve essere sottoscritta.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.EventDrivenActivity>

trans-unit.source: The execution context for the activity.
trans-unit.target: Il contesto di esecuzione per l'attività.

trans-unit.source: The activity added to the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: L'attività aggiunta a di <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.StateActivity"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Called by the workflow runtime engine as part of the activity's transition to the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus"></xref> state.
trans-unit.target: Chiamato dal motore di runtime del flusso di lavoro come parte della transizione dell'attività per il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus"> </xref> stato.

trans-unit.source: The service provider from which to obtain services.
trans-unit.target: Il provider di servizi da cui ottenere i servizi.

trans-unit.source: Holds the string value of the change tracking data key; "StateActivity.StateChange".
trans-unit.target: Contiene il valore di stringa il rilevamento delle modifiche la chiave di dati. "StateActivity".

trans-unit.source: This field is a constant.
trans-unit.target: Questo campo è costante.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.
